name: Nora-san the Tsungire Cat
nutshell: A heart-warming cat life story about Sae, a typical office lady, and Nora, a cat that has the appearance of a human.

name: Golf - Super Psychology Course
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Golf is said to be a gentleman's sport, but in reality, it's all about mentality! Golf is a sport that reveals people's true nature: they are cautious when they play for entertainment, they are mean to each other, they act cool when there are women, they make excuses and cheat to hide their bad shots, and ...... golf is a sport that reveals people's true nature. And if three or four old men get together, all they can think about is the 19th hole at night! This is a golf manga for mature adults, serialized in "GOLF Comic" magazine!

name: Amon Game
nutshell:
A sudden advent of an enigmatic creature pushes the world and our young heroine, Yuki, into the realm of the surreal.
Winner of the Grand Prix Award in Kodansha's AFTERNOON SHIKI.
See AnimeNewsNetwork for 1st movie.
See AnimeNewsNetwork for 2nd movie.

name: Auto Hunting
nutshell:
The world under attack by monsters that are pouring from the 'fracture'. And the 'hunters' who hunt those monsters are the most coveted job in the world currently. One day, Oh Yunsung who works his hardest from day to day as a worker in a meat restaurant awakens an ability to automatically hunt monsters with perfect techniques and physical prowess like in MMORPG when he presses a button 'Auto Hunting' that appears in front of him…!


Original Webtoon <kakao>
Original Webtoon <Naver>
Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>
Original Webtoon <Mootoon>




Official Simplified Chinese Translation


Official Japanese Translation


Official French Translation


Official Thai Translation

name: Touhou - Tatoe Tokoyo no Kanata demo (Doujinshi)
The Divine Physician
nutshell: She went back in time, and Feng Yuheng, genius in both Western and Chinese medicine, became an abused legitimate daughter in the shun dynasty. But you want to kill me? I'll stab you with my scalpel and make you unable to move your lower body? You want to fight against me? I have an apothecary with me, and both fame and money are in my hands. even the emperor wants to form close ties with me!But what’s with this marriage contract? a disfigured, lame person just flirted with me, and he even wants me to conquer the world with him? Are you off your rockers, you hooligan of a prince?

name: Love You Everyday
nutshell: After an embarrassing encounter, Fei Yuan would like nothing more than to escape Fu Zhaoshui. But Fu Zhaoshui is relentless, and he will do anything to keep Fei Yuan within his clutches. The two men engage in an elaborate game of cat and mouse, with passionate love nudging them along

name: Roelin's Path to the Future
nutshell: Roelin Deaz, the daughter of Count Deaz, who is supporting the family that is in debt due to her father's business failure. While struggling to raise the family on the verge of collapse, Roelin has an accident that almost killed her one day. This as an opportunity, she remembers the past when she was the high priest of the temple of night and darkness, which has now disappeared, and gains the power of her previous life, which is the power to know the future through dreams-! After accepting her change, Roelin uses her previous life's experiences and abilities to work hard to revive her family. Then one day, through a dream, she sees someone's death. That person is none other than the protector of the empire, Duke Dante Van Benerite, who is called the Knight of Brilliance!? Roelin learns of his miserable future and becomes conflicted...! What will Roelin do?

name: Japan Sinks (SAITO Takao)
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Earthquakes occur in clusters in the Japanese archipelago. Volcanoes erupt, triggered by the earthquakes.
The natural cataclysms that occur one after another...
...are adapted from Sakyo Komatsu's bestseller into a manga. A new series is now available.
Official English - Fully translated. Also available on Amazon Kindle.

name: Rolling Girls - MisaChiyo! -the path they chose- (Doujinshi)
Kashikomi Mousu!
nutshell: Sayo has always wanted to be a spirit messenger, and at last she's assigned to a position at a shrine. However, when she arrives she finds only ruins and a lazy priest. But Sayo won't let these obstacles deter her! She'll clean that shrine up and the priest with it!

name: Unmei wa Tonari no Heya Kara
Kiss no Tsuzuki wa Gaman Shimasu - Honto wa Imasugu Shite Mitai!?
nutshell:
"I want to see Mr. Kenyama's serious face when he kisses and beyond." What this ... It seems that he was kissed harder than before and it's not my body, it's hot ... strange. Straight-laced office lady x flirty man synchronization started dating with interest ♪
25 years of living without a single serious boyfriend. Sumire Katsuyama witnessed her coworker Ito, who is a flirty man who is not a good worker, doing erotic things with a beautiful woman!?  "I'm not interested in anything other than work" is cool, but in reality, I'm crazy about H, and I'm secretly horny !? Too hard and defeated... It was Ito who helped Sumire, and for some reason, she accidentally went out with him ... "It's decided, I'm going to be your lover," and within five seconds, I kissed him and went to bed with him. But now I'm being pushed down...!?

name: Kakugo no Susume - Voltex
nutshell:
serialized in Champion Red, July 2004
compiled in Kakugo no Susume bunkoban(Champion Red)

name: Rikou ni Naru ni wa Aosugiru
nutshell: One day, 27-year-old Haruto Sakurada is contacted by his childhood friend to play in a game show where people challenge professional gamers.

name: Where The Dragon's Rain Falls
nutshell: Once upon a time, in the desert of the Rahan Empire a dragon blessed the land with rain and was worshiped as a symbol of reconstruction that brought new life to the country. The dragon dissappeared and the people waited for its return for over a hundred years. One day, news of a dragon's offspring were spread. The crown prince is told to face the dragon, as people feared it was going to destroy them, but when he went to face it all he found was a child, a semi-god dragon child at that. A priest proposed for the child to always stay in a Shinto shrine in order to not be noticed by anyone. They would wait for the child to grow until it could transform into his original form. However, on the eve of the Dragon's Festival, a young and beautiful boy, "Suu", accidentally finds the kid in a barn… Time passes and Suu becomes the love interest of two men who look rather familiar to him…

name: One Of Four
tags: Boys' Love,School Life,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: During school days, Sunghyun was diagnosed as an omega. During his childhood, he became friends with four people and soon they were cut out of his life. He reunite with them whom he thought he would never meet again. One day, Sunghyun was surrounded by four alphas who were coincidentally his childhood friend. They were all in heat and no matter how much pills he took to lessen the heat, it was impossible…

name: Do You Know a Fairy?
tags: Long Strip,Boys' Love,School Life,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell: Due to his unique ability of seeing guardian fairies, Eun-Oh is deemed to be a loner. One day, the new transfer student Jae Hwi approached him without hesitation! "I feel good whenever I'm with you." After being told such words, Eun-Oh started to have a change of heart…

name: Toaru Majutsu no Index - Misaka-san Time (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Kamijou Touma confessed to Misaka Mikoto!?

name: Saber Cats
nutshell: Martial Arts In Space And Stuff

name: The Always-Sleepy Classmate Wants Help
nutshell:
When the new seating change comes to their class, Kogoshi-kun finds himself sitting next to the ever-tired Oki-san.
She has a request, though: wake her up whenever she falls asleep without letting the teacher know.

name: Akari o Otoshita Ato de
nutshell:
One day, a customer barged into Takumi's tailoring shop, requesting to buy a suit that didn't fit him well – but he was in such a hurry that he couldn't stay long enough to have it fixed or even take his receipt. He came back days later to apologize and order the commission of a new suit. As time went by, Takumi started taking an interest in Takano-sama. On the night Takumi was to deliver the suit, Takano-sama confessed that they had met once more before he came in the shop…
FRENCH :
Un jour, un client a fait irruption dans le magasin de confection de Takumi, demandant à acheter un costume qui ne lui allait pas bien – mais il était tellement pressé qu'il n'a pas ou rester assez longtemps pour le faire ajuster ou même prendre son reçu.
Il est revenu quelques jours plus tard pour s'excuser et commander un nouveau costume. Au fil du temps, Takumi commence à s'intéresser à Takano-sama.

name: Matsurugi En Short Story Collection
nutshell:
Short story collection set in the world of Matsurugi En's other series "Shun Nyan" and "Retirement Collection".
Current Story: [Tabi Neko]
Miki is a college student who lives with her grandmother to attend college. At the end of the year, she gave up returning to her parent's house due to a part time job. On New Year's Eve, a rare customer came to visit…?

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - The Smell of the Sheets
Stigma Effect
nutshell:
A maid who is beaten on behalf of a noble boy.
Some memories of her childhood were cruel, but Yuriel held no resentment towards the boy. Rather, she liked it–The hand that carefully applied medicine to her wounds was always warm.
“M-Master, stop, Raph, sa, save…ah, mm…!”
“That’s why.. I told you.. to wait.. till I returned.”
But the Raphlet that appeared in her dreams showed nothing but passion and lust.
Prophetic dreams.
The ability that was like a stigma drove Yuriel towards an unknown future.
All I want is to be next to you.


Note:
The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel

name: Grandeek ReeL
nutshell:
Tiia Oruburaianto is a young woman traveling the world, searching for the best weapons. Tiia is a strong warrior and possesses not only the legendary sword Grandeek, but also the unique ability to see and speak to spirits that reside within weapons and armor. During her travels, Tiia hears a small voice calling for help. Tiia eventually finds the source of the voice—the sword of an infamous assassin. Undaunted, Tiia decides to save both the sword and its owner.
Note: Shueisha restarted its serialization in Ultra Jump (December 2005) under new title "GRANDEEK ReeL"

nutshell:
